text: aur jin logon ko tumase pahale kitaabe khuda ata kee gayee hai unako aur tumako bhee usakee hamane vaseeyat kee thee ki (khuda) (kee naafaramaanee) se darate raho aur agar (kaheen) tumane kufr ikhteyaar kiya to (yaad rahe ki) jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaj sab kuchh) khuda hee ka hai (jo chaahe kar sakata hai) aur khuda to sabase beparava aur (hama sifat) mausoof har hamd vaala hai
